quotes.quote: Exceptional people deserve special concessions.
For every individual who really is exceptional there are about fifty thousand who just imagine they are until it's too late, and they find out they aren't after all.
Only the exceptional paths bring exceptional glories!
It's only those exceptional and rare individuals who have brilliant ideas delivered to them by the muse, complete and gift wrapped. The rest of us have to work at it.
Exceptional performers are masterful opportunists, keenly alert to opportunity!
Exceptional talent and extraordinary creativity are irrelevant! It's what you do with what little you have that counts big time in the end.
The exceptional life depends not on working harder, but on different, even opposite, actions from habit and the crowd.
Be the exception to the rule. It's the surest way to become exceptional.
Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.
People see themselves as succeeding because they are individually exceptional they don't see that there is a mechanism that has made it possible for them.
To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
There are exceptional people out there who are capable of starting epidemics. All you have to do is find them.
Exceptional thinkers ignore their critics and go about their business making history.
Exceptional people are often called crazy by the ordinary world.
Exceptional people convert life's setbacks into future successes.
Be the exceptional being who separates themselves from the herd and the fate of the herd.
An exceptional life isn't the result of lucky breaks but excellent choices.
Exceptional ideas create excellent opportunities.
Exceptional talent does not always win its reward unless favored by exceptional circumstances.

In all nations an exceptional man exists that compensates the deficiencies of the remainder. In those moments, when humanity is found collectively in a state of decadence, there always remain those exceptional beings as point of reference.
In exceptional circumstances exceptional in that all circumstances in life are exceptional, especially those which are nothing in themselves and come to be everything in their results.
Exceptional people learn that doing their best is all they can do.
Be exceptional. Make tremendous efforts to be extraordinary. What a privilege to be here on the planet to contribute your unique donation to humankind. Just make sure you do so.
If everyone is exceptional, nobody is exceptional.
The true exceptional performer is on super pilot. Every single sense, every fiber of his body is brought together in what he is doing.
Exceptional results arrive only when exceptional people put in exceptional effort. It never arises by accident or good fortune.
